categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Rhana Hyss was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. By 3643 BBY, Hyss was on a classified assignment for the Jedi Council when the Jedi was infected with a plague by the Sith Lord Vivicar and went insane. However, she was freed when Vivicar was defeated.

Rhana Hyss was first mentioned in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Consular players after the conclusion of Act I if they chose to allow Terrak Morrhage to kill the Jedi Masters connected to him.
